The following figure shows the image that appears in the "washing the car" task. This is a .png file. The Toolkit can process .png, .jpg, and .gif.
Ditaval files are used in conditional processing. The following figure shows a .ditaval file that filters out topics in the garage sample that have to do with oil or snow.

Multiple .ditamap files can be used in a single project to process the same set of source files in different ways. The garage sample has a .ditamap file that processes the files in a hierarchy, with the tasks nested under an overview file about tasks, and the concepts nested under an overview file about concepts.
